node.title: Brian Tamaki taken into police custody
node.description: Police said a 63-year-old man was arrested in relation to a breach of bail conditions following an event in Christchurch earlier this month.
node.content:
["Destiny Church leader Brian Tamaki has been taken into police custody.", "", "
Brian Tamaki (file photo) Photo: RNZ / Marika Khabazi
", "His group, the Freedom and Rights Coalition, broadcast the incident this morning on social media.", "Police said a 63-year-old man was arrested in relation to a breach of bail conditions following an event in Christchurch earlier this month.", "In a statement police said the man was due to appear in the Auckland District Court via audio visual link later today.", "Tamaki is facing charges of breaching Covid lockdown restrictions and a condition of bail was that he not attend further protests.", "Tamaki and his wife Hannah earlier posted a separate video in which he said the police were coming to arrest him.", "In the video Tamaki said if he did end up in prison he could be New Zealand's first political prisoner."]
